title: Man of Integrity
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Mahomes, the Bengals, 'why you quit football' and the World Series featuring my cities!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones discusses Kansas City’s decline this year and QB Patrick Mahomes’ poor play (1:20). Plus, it’s a Houston and Atlanta World Series made for Bo (12:14), an IYHH that includes a grid that’s not ready for electric cars (32:19) and your voicemails from when you "quit" football (44:43)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @willenglund says plug-in cars are the future. The grid isn’t ready: https://wapo.st/3b7mFoX
  2. @anya1anya shares polling data that says 1 in 3 working families is struggling to find child care: https://n.pr/3pAyLQ1
  3. @gabriels_geiger shares that Colombia is finally sterilizing Pablo Escobar’s hippos: https://bit.ly/3vFWPlC
